reviews.title: A personal bank that outs its money where its beliefs are
reviews.text: Our housing coop took a mortgage with Ecology Building Society almost 20 years ago. A man called Jon sorted it out for us. We're now building 29 new houses and need a new mortgage - guess what? Jon has sorted it for us.

reviews.title: Making our dream come true!
reviews.text: When we went for a mortgage with the bank we use for all our banking, one that says it supports people like us -farmers wanting to build a home and going that extra mile for us and then they turned us down and so did all the other normal banks just because our barn conversion was a little unique and different it was Ecology who gave us a mortgage and made our dream come true. It was easy and simple and more importantly sensible. Just common sense!

reviews.title: Underpinned a 50 year community for the last 10 years.
reviews.text: The Ecology Building Society provided a large loan for us to buy back half of a historic building that has been home to a changing community over 50 years. We have a social and environmental approach to sharing while we also all get on with our own lives. A grand house built for a rich family has been home to up to 19 people of all ages and backgrounds at a time. Without the Ecology we could not have done this.

reviews.title: Mortgages safe as houses
reviews.text: The Ecology Building Society has been helpful over the years in providing information and advice

reviews.title: Very helpful
reviews.text: We needed a self-build mortgage for an unusual house built to high thermal eficiency standards. Elsewhere was often "computer says no". Ecology took the time to understand the concept and then couldn't have been more helpul. Great people, great philosophy. All lenders are not equal!

reviews.title: Community and friendly
reviews.text: Old school banking principles in a digital age

reviews.title: Imaginative and individual service
reviews.text: The Ecology supports the sympathetic preservation of old buildings and granted a mortgage on our 450-year-old home after a major building society withdrew its offer at the last minute on questionable grounds.

reviews.title: Mrs Carole Neal
reviews.text: They were the only Building Society that would finance our unusual eco project and provided support and took an interest right through to completion. We were invited to present our project to other members at their AGM in order to help those members in their own projects. We have not hesitated to recommend the Ecology Building Society to other people in our position. They provided finance up front which meant that we didn't have to get a bridging loan which is common practice for self builders, When we required more money late in the project that money was readily forthcoming. As both borrowers and savers we have attended many AGMs, which are always well attended, and have been made welcome and our points and opinions have been valued. It is truly a members' society.

reviews.title: Opportunity
reviews.text: The Ecology B.S through their mortgage products gave me the opportunity to fulfil my dream of a self build using non mainstream products ie car tyres and strawbale. I would like to thank both the founders of the society and the always helpful staff.

reviews.title: Best ethical mortgage provider/Customer Service Champion
reviews.text: We chose the Ecology Building Society because we wanted to build an Eco friendly PassivHaus. We knew nothing about them apart form the fact that this was the type of project to which they lent money. However, our journey with them has been very enjoyable. The staff at Ecology have been delightful and easy to deal with. They understood the building process and didn't delay decisions. They have treated us fairly and continue to do so, and their instructions are straightforward and understandable. We always feel like everything is transparent and there is no hidden red tape. We would wholeheartedly recommend them.

reviews.title: Always helpful, kind and professional, with a mission that is positive to the world
reviews.text: They gave us a self build mortgage at a time that no one else would as mortgages were tougher to get. Our house is environmentally positive with good insulation, solar panels, air source heat pump and underfloor heating, with no gas connection, which fits well with ecology's mission. We couldn't have achieved our dream home without their support. They made the process really easy to apply, with a lot of support throughout and stayed in contact throughout the build to ensure that we were always on the best rate that they could offer. Always helpful, kind and professional, with a mission that is positive to the world.

reviews.title: Eco focussed Loans
reviews.text: We obtained a mortgage for a piece of natural English woodland to enjoy the peace and tranquility of nature. Without Ecology and their products this would never been a reality. Thanks to Ecology and their forward thinking approach to sustainability we have been able to live the dream to own our own Woodland! I can't recommend them enough!

reviews.title: True to their principles
reviews.text: The Ecology BS provided us with a mortgage when no one else would. It was a risky project but one true to Ecology's principles and a zero carbon future. The Ecology look at the big picture and support those of us working for a better, greener future.

reviews.title: Satisfied customer
reviews.text: We are delighted to have our mortgage with Ecology. We know that our money is doing good in the community and that social responsibility and ethics are taken very seriously. Without the Ecology, many socially responsible eco-housing projects across the UK would not have been possible. Their newsletter is very positive and inspiring. We have had no issues with the management of our mortgage over the past 15 years and we have made many energy-efficiency improvements to our home during that time. We wish them every success.

reviews.title: Game-changer
reviews.text: Without our loan from Ecology BS, we would never have got our community-led housing project off the ground.

reviews.title: Excellent experience - Eco renovation mortgage
reviews.text: The Ecology Building Society (BS) have been exceptional. We bought an agricultural property, which had a number of restrictions that other lenders knew very little about and/or were not willing to consider (either at all or without a 20%+ deposit). The Ecology BS had fantastic working knowledge of agricultural ties and Mary Blackburn supported us throughout the application process - which involved a number of additional steps, due to the type of property. Their customer service is truly amazing, run by a small and incredibly friendly team. We are renovating the mortgaged property to a high energy efficient standard. The Ecology BS shared our enthusiasm for the project, advising on both short and long term options. We will soon complete Phase 1 of the retrofit, with the Ecology renovation mortgage offering C-Change discounts on the mortgage interest rate, to reward improved energy ratings. Amid the current context of a climate emergency, this type of financial incentive for Eco works is immensely valuable – both in terms of individual finances and the wider impact on the planet. It has been a genuine pleasure to deal with such an ethical and sustainable bank and I would 100% recommend them to anyone and everyone. Thank you Ecology!

reviews.title: Excellent communication, efficient service
reviews.text: We have had a superb experience with Ecology. They have by far been the most helpful and easiest financial institution we have dealt with. The communication with staff has been excellent and service has been really efficient - something that is often lacking with financial institutions. I have already recommended them to others a number of time sand will continue to do so.

reviews.title: Keeping it simple
reviews.text: First time self building a home, so was very daunted by the prospect of this type of mortgage, however I needn't have worried. The flexibility offered by Ecology is second to none, allowing you to withdraw funds as and when you need, and the process to do so only involves a quick email. Can't recommend them highly enough

reviews.title: Simply Outstanding - A brighter, greener future to mortgage finance
reviews.text: Our experience of Ecology has been absolutely faultless from the very first phone enquiry that we made, throughout the mortgage application process and through the duration of our self-build so far. Their customer service is outstanding - questions and queries are dealt with very efficiently by friendly, helpful people, who seem to really know what they are doing. Each time we’ve made a draw down, the funds have reached our bank account on the same day. When we needed to request a short payment holiday, they facilitated that seamlessly. Whenever we speak to someone at Ecology, they seem very knowledgable and well informed and that means that our queries have been answered fully and swiftly. They also seem to really understand the challenges facing self-builders; their guidance and advice has always been clear and reassuring. Their commitment to sustainable approaches to building and development is fundamental to all that they do. They lend money to projects in ways which enable genuinely progressive approaches to building and renovating houses and communities. With a very modest budget, we have built an accessible timber frame home that is ultra energy efficient and sustainable in the true sense. It also complies fully with building regulations, yet because our house isn’t traditional bricks and mortar, Ecology were the ONLY lenders that would even consider offering us a mortgage. Home building must evolve to become more efficient and sustainable in order to meet the challenges of this century. The materials and technology to do this already exist, but if they are to be widely adopted in the mainstream it will require more mortgage providers to be like Ecology - supporting and funding projects which demonstrate how a brighter, greener future could be built.

reviews.title: They try to understand you
reviews.text: People who will listen to projects and will support individuals by making decisions on merit. Clients are not just anonymous ticked boxes.

reviews.title: Saved the day
reviews.text: We were getting stuck in to our development when COVID hit and our lender pulled out. Ecology were quick to offer f8nance and proceed seamlessly. They have been very helpful throughout the process.

reviews.title: Saviours!
reviews.text: At the age of 67 no other mortgage provider would lend me the money to complete a timber build house in the West Highlands. Ecology had no hesitation in doing so. I found the staff very friendly and approachable and at all times I felt I was being treated with kindness and understanding when other lenders (particularly RBS with whom I had banked for 50 years) were dismissive.

reviews.title: They get sustainability!
reviews.text: Our plans for our house were nodded through when other lenders seemed threatened by a degree of innovation. The questionnaire drove us to do more! They were on the ball from the start to the end and we were delighted with their help. We still save with them despite there being no interest to speak of because we want to see them help others as they did us.

reviews.title: ecology building society
reviews.text: efficient and ethical service providing an environmentally friendly service at all times with a strong emphasis on the climate emergency.

reviews.title: Highly recommended
reviews.text: Very helpful service and a breath of fresh air compared to other mortgage providers.

reviews.title: Can't go wrong with great cause and excellent service
reviews.text: It's been a delight dealing with Ecology and everyone I've been in contact has been extremely kind and patient with me. A level of service that you don't see nowadays.

reviews.title: Excellent mortgage provider who prioritise the environmental benefits of new build homes.
reviews.text: Delighted I was able to get my mortgage with Ecology, they consider the environmental benefits contained within the property. A great experience

reviews.title: Pure Haus
reviews.text: Ecology have been very supportive of our goal to revolutionise the built environment. We highly recommend them, they are a great team

reviews.title: Ethically and sustainably sound
reviews.text: We financed our old brick barn re-build in North Yorkshire through Ecology. One of the few if not only finance companies that actively encourage sustainable builds and renovations, If only all finance was as clean as Ecology!

reviews.title: Top Equal Opportunities Bank
reviews.text: With my partner being disabled and us having children recently, we were forced to close our company and claim benefits, hopefully temporarily. Ecology, we're the only bank we could turn to when considering a mortgage and treated us with discrimination. Brillian service all round, TOP BANK!

reviews.title: One day all lenders will be like this
reviews.text: We built our own house and spent the best part of 9 months jumping through the hoops laid out by anither building society. In the end they left us high and dry so we turned to Wcology, expecting our build to be delayed while we negotiated a new set of hoops. Incredibly we spoke to a real person who asked relevant questions and who actually understood the answers. Suddenly our home was within reach and exchanged tears of frustration and worry for tears of joy. There was more to come and when our build costs rocketed and we were heading for doom, Ecology stepped in, calmed us down and lent us more money. Weeks of worry sorted with one phone call. One day all lenders will be like this. Listening, understanding, guiding and problem solving. All with a smile and great humour. Real people.

reviews.title: Renovation of 17th century thatched cottage
reviews.text: 30 years ago the EBS were the only mortgage providers in the whole country that would lend on a property that had no bathroom. We are still living here (with a bathroom !) and had second thatch on roof with financial help from EBS. Thanks EBS.

reviews.title: Renovation mortgage
reviews.text: Helped us get our redevelopment project underway after years of planning and not finding a way forward till we spoke to Ecology

reviews.title: Interest rate went down, mortgage went down, good stuff
reviews.text: No issues so far, was the only company at the time who would do the Shared Ownership I needed

reviews.title: Ecology made it Possible
reviews.text: Ecology's mortgage enabled us to complete our straw bale house which no other financial provider we approached would touch! Thank you for not being afraid of something non-mainstream. We now live comfortably in our lovely warm house.

reviews.title: Friendly, approachable Society
reviews.text: From initial contact through to mortgage release Ecology have been more than just a building society with friendly and helpful employees, I'd definitely recommend

reviews.title: Excellent service - customer-focused and friendly
reviews.text: Gaining any mortgage can be a fraught experience, and this can be particularly true for a self-build house. Throughout the application and since, Ecology have focused on the outcomes I was trying to achieve, not simply on ticking their own boxes (though, of course, that still needed to be done!). They were extremely helpful in shaping their offer to best meet my needs and were always very prompt in responding to my queries. I believe I could not have done better in choosing Ecology to supply my mortgage needs.

reviews.title: super-efficient friendly clear customer service
reviews.text: Ecology were fantastic during my self-build project. It was easy to get through to a human being on the phone and I always got a very clear answer to any query. When I needed action (e.g. a retention release) it always happened within 24 hours of requesting it.

reviews.title: my eco friendly home made possible
reviews.text: I almost gave up on building my dream self build environmentally friendly home as I could not afford self build industry interest rates. Then I found Ecology building society and my dream became a reality. Excellent friendly customer service, the most competitive interest rates by far, a strategy not based on greed snd high fees but helping people build efficient homes. After watching grand designs for years I have build my home and enjoy it every day thanks to ecology building society. For me they were a lighthouse in a dark storm of despair.

reviews.title: Great company to deal with, and with good values!
reviews.text: We were not able to get a standard mortgage through other lenders as the house we wanted to buy was in need of complete renovation. Researching our options led us to finding Ecology. We were able to get a mortgage with the aim to improve the energy efficiency rating of the property which lined up well with what we wanted to do anyway! The process of applying for the mortgage involved setting out our plans for the renovation which was time consuming and fairly challenging but any queries we had were dealt with quickly and we received great support from Ecology to guide us through this whenever we needed it. We would definitely recommend Ecology to anyone in a similar situation!

reviews.title: Ethical and user friendly
reviews.text: It feels like I'm taking to people who understand - not just a call centre. You can explain situations and agree resolution of issues that you would send no chance of achieving with the high street banks

reviews.title: Savings
reviews.text: On line news about the support given to good house builds by individuals or communities is an important way to use funds available.

reviews.title: Best customer service
reviews.text: We have had our self build mortgage with the Ecology Building Society from the start of our build. Our needs were very exacting, a large mortgage, and unusual build and the challenges of a self build. Having originally gone to a broker and failed we went directly to the EBS and they confirmed the mortgage in a matter in a few weeks. The EBS customer service is just amazing, I do not know of any other bank who would take such an interest in a build and actually come to site to see the build in progress. A great team offering an excellent product.

reviews.title: Self-build house
reviews.text: After meeting resistance from a high street mortgage lender we approached Ecoloy with our project for a low energy self-build dwelling with a degree of scepticism. Our concerns soon vanished as the whole process proved to be very straightforward with excellent communication both by email and telephone and with no annoying press 1,2,3, etc!. Overall we were very pleased with the outcome and very happy to be working with an ethical lender like Ecology.

reviews.title: Two BBC Awards
reviews.text: The EBS granted us their first green business loan in 1990 at a time when the banks did not have the vision. We were very successful & have saved with them ever since. They are personable, friendly and efficient. In 30 years we have never had a problem & feel closely loyal to them.

reviews.title: Real People making ethical decisions
reviews.text: Unlike the mass- market algorithm approach ("computer says no") the Ecology BS is staffed with real people. They listen to their customers; they not only consider unconventional projects they actively encourage them! The Ecology BS is supporting diverse projects and helping diverse people deliver them all over the UK. Well done !

reviews.title: Encouraging building the right way
reviews.text: Building an ecological home is highly challenging, but it makes a huge difference when you can rely on your mortgage provider to be supportive and encouraging of these endeavours. Great people with the right products to encourage people like me to do the right thing for the environment

reviews.title: Supportive, pragmatic and environmentally sound
reviews.text: Ecology Building Society supported me to self build/renovate an off grid Galloway Cottage. They were realistic and made draw down of funds during the build simple. I have continued my mortgage with them to support their environmental agenda.

reviews.title: Self Build Support
reviews.text: Amazingly easy to deal with, super-friendly staff you can speak to. Great to have this available to support our self-build and by far the least stressful element :)

reviews.title: Good quick efficient service
reviews.text: Very easy to speak to, very helpful explained everything in plain English, can't recommend them enough and have done to anybody who is looking for a self build mortgage

reviews.title: great
reviews.text: great service. very friendly advice

reviews.title: The best place to save your money and invest in the future without damaging our planet
reviews.text: I joined the Ecology Building Society as a TESSA saver and then as a new ISA saver to save for a future project whilst supporting this incredible organisation and their projects. Later, I gained a mortgage through them, paid through the Coop Bank, for a sustainable and sympathetic restoration of two cottages, divided many years ago and re-joined using local and natural reclaimed materials and improving the warmth of the home using UK natural sheep's wool insulation. Our shelter and future have been made possible whilst investing and sharing our planet, and with less damage to it.

reviews.title: you and the planet..they care for!
reviews.text: Very easy to deal with,so friendly,relatively small but caring and capable...what is not to like!

reviews.title: Friendly, helpful, thorough and quick
reviews.text: We are self builders who needed more capital than expected, Ecology understood the situation, responded quickly and helpfully. Plain English paperwork, sensible and thorough questions and checks but always supportive of our modern construction methods and energy efficiency goals. Their pro-active customer service also makes them a delight to deal with once the mortgage is approved. Excellent all round!

reviews.title: Helping us build our dream
reviews.text: The Ecology Building Society has stuck with us for 18 years. As a coop we needed a mortgage to buy our first house. They were the only mortgage lender that understood us. Years later they helped us buy our second house and now they have not only provided a £2 million pound loan but also supported us to get other funding to build 29 eco houses and a common house for the whole community to share. We truly believe that it is only because of their strong ethical approach that they have been able to believe in us and our dream.

reviews.title: Finance with a human face
reviews.text: The Ecology were not only green before it was fashionable, but they still treat members with respect. They are one of the few modern institutions who still seem to value customer loyalty.

reviews.title: Ethical Friendly Service
reviews.text: We have had our mortgage with the Ecology for 23 years. They helped us realise our dream of land and a barn to convert when no other lender could understand the concept of being as energy efficient as possible. Since then they have helped us with further advances for more updated energy measures and the same small team and personal service still exists as it did 23 years ago. How many banks can retain that level of polite friendly service as they did 20 plus years ago! I'm pleased we never left for a 'better rate' only to be stung with unforeseen costs, I will be proud to have supported the bank that supported us when no one else would right to the end of 25 year term :)

reviews.title: Sustainability
reviews.text: Love the ethics of EBS and their tremendous support over the years . Austin

reviews.title: Excellent service
reviews.text: Easy, friendly, supportive and always available

reviews.title: Ecology Make It Possible
reviews.text: Ecology was the only building society that would give a mortgage for an eco build in hempcrete.

reviews.title: Enabling active ecology
reviews.text: The Ecology Building society put their faith in me to build my home to the highest ecological standards. They have very exacting fiscal requirements, which shows good financial prudence, whilst also enabling ecology to be brought to life through creating my eco home.

reviews.title: Ideally matched lender for our needs and beliefs
reviews.text: In 2008 Ecology was the only lender we could find that would lend for a green self-build farmhouse with an agricultural occupancy condition. They have been flexible and responsive ever since, and the C-change discount for our A-rated EPC has been very welcome.

reviews.title: Ecology - self build mortgages made simple!
reviews.text: We took out a self build mortgage with Ecology. Aside from incentivising customers to really consider a new builds green credentials, we have found Ecology super to deal with. Very fast turnaround at every stage, always a real person available to speak to and find them very helpful and straightforward to deal with. Compared to other lenders we looked at, Ecology was by far the best in terms of the product on offer and their attitude and ethos, would highly recommend to anyone embarking on a self build project!

reviews.title: Assessed by real people, not by computer
reviews.text: We are in the final stages of building an unusual house, low carbon, ultra low heating, etc. Instead of a standard response (typically "computer says no"), the Ecology mortgage team member assigned to the case took the trouble to understand the build and the ethics behind it; she went through our finances and got back to us when she thought we'd overstated one of our costs; and they then made a very reasonable offer which we accepted. All the way through, it's been a pleasure to deal with them.

reviews.title: Personal touch worth weight in gold!
reviews.text: Selfbuild mortgages are more complicated than a highstreet mortgage, but it was so easy with Ecology and so important to have a person answer the phone or email. That personal touch means the world. Highly recommend to other selfbuilders.

reviews.title: Have enabled us to build a highly innovative home
reviews.text: Ecology building society have enabled the dreams of an engineer and environmental scientist couple. Other lenders we're not willing to support a project of this nature.

reviews.title: Excellent mortgage provider for my eco self-build
reviews.text: Ecology were helpful every step of the way and I felt they listened to our requirements for the build etc as against a simple tick box or 'computer says no' attitude.

reviews.title: Friendly, knowledgeable staff
reviews.text: Always friendly and able to help

reviews.title: Log Home Mortgage!
reviews.text: High street banks just did not want to know regarding building a low carbon sustainable home for my family. Ecology welcomed us with open arms & cheque book :-) & could not have been friendlier about it . Its been that way with them for 10+ years now. Highly recommend Ecology

reviews.title: Accommodating and integrous
reviews.text: Ecology have been immensely supportive of our eco build. Their approach to ethical and environmentally responsible lending is second to none.

reviews.title: Great company great ethos
reviews.text: Ecology are easy to deal with always helpful with any queries easy to contact and they care I would and have recommended them to friends and family

reviews.title: A mortgage i was pleased to pay to help others. Always helpful and returned my calls.
reviews.text: I had a buy to let mortgage which allowed me to build the first flats in London to use ground source heat pumps. I was the winner of a FMB Master Builder of the Year in 2005. I would not have received this award without the support of the Ecology Building Society. I support their work without reservation. They support and loan to self builders where other lenders would not go. Thank you

reviews.title: Absolutely supportive in green building, fantastic customer service
reviews.text: Cannot fault their support in green and sustainable building, fantastic team and customer service

reviews.title: Ecology Cares
reviews.text: Have had my mortgage with Ecology for 5 years and have no plans of moving away. Ecology have treated is fairly and with consideration every step of our build and beyond.

reviews.title: Fast professional service
reviews.text: Ecollogy B. S are a breath of fresh air in the current mortgage market. None of the usual personal interrogation during the application process -just a straightforward process based on financial common sense

reviews.title: Brilliant to deal with
reviews.text: I am customer who has a self build mortgage with Ecology. They are absolutely brilliant to deal with and made the process of self building my home easy from a funding perspective. I always get to speak to a knowledgeable human, they are always sensible & flexible in their approach. Covid didn’t seem to affect their service delivery. Always impressive, friendly, helpful. I’ve recommended them continuously to fellow self builders. They have proven that a UK based bank/building society can easily deliver a good service, something that most seem unable to do.

reviews.title: Great self build mortgage
reviews.text: After trying no end of mortgage providers we heard about ecology. They were fantastic guided us all the way through the application and when the house was completed swapped us over to a standard mortgage. Also over the first few months of the pandemic they were brilliant when everything was uncertain. Can't recommend them enough

reviews.title: A refreshing change
reviews.text: We have an Ecology Building Society mortgage currently, we used the mortgage to build our dream home. Since being with ecology we have been contacted three times to check in and be offered options to lower our outgoings-how refreshing.

reviews.title: Fantastic company
reviews.text: Ecology’s ethos and unique provision of mortgages for woodlands allowed our family to fulfil a dream of owning our own woodland to preserve and develop. Their process was simple and their customer care faultless.

reviews.title: Ecology made it possible for us to buy our Community Land Trust home
reviews.text: When no other mortgage provider would consider lending to us, because we were buying one of London’s first Community Land Trust homes, Ecology stepped up and made our dream apartment a reality. We cannot thank them enough for supporting us and genuinely affordable housing.

reviews.title: Woodland Review
reviews.text: Ecology Building Society helped me to buy a small woodland in Northumberland & I am so grateful for all of their help & support. All of the staff are so friendly & helpful. They’ve really made my dreams come true!

reviews.title: Rewarding sustainable self-building
reviews.text: Ecology not only were prepared to loan to us on our timber framed self build, but reward sustainability, by lowering the interest rate as the eco-credentials of your house build improve. Win-win!

reviews.title: Self Build Mortgage
reviews.text: Having been robbed by a builder I unexpectedly had to organise a mortgage on a one third built build at the great age of 68 years old. Ecology were extremely helpful and a life saver for me. Also they encourage the building of out of the ordinary houses with good "eco" credentials, which is reflected in the interest rate of the mortgage. Can't recommend them enough.

reviews.title: Excellent in every way
reviews.text: In 2013 I required a mortgage to complete an architecturally designed Siberian Larch 4 bedroom house in rural Argyll. RBS, with whom I have had personal and business accounts since 1963, were emphatic in their denial - as were many other lenders - because I was either too old (mid sixties and well able to repay any mortgage!) or because wood was not acceptable in rural Scotland! Fortunately, Ecology Building Society were more than happy to listen to.me and offer me an affordable mortgage. I felt I was dealing with empathetic staff who seemed to regard my building project as normal and who were prepared to lend the full mortgage I requested. Since then there has even been a reduction in my repayments. I cannot fault Ecology in any way and cannot commend them highly enough. Other lenders should take note!

reviews.title: Excellent customer service and climate concious
reviews.text: I have a self-build mortgage and criteria is based on eco- credentials. Every interaction with Be Ecology has been fast, efficient, and friendly - what a difference from most banks!

reviews.title: Very helpful. Last lender in UK who helped us
reviews.text: Very helpfully enabled us to build our dream home in the country after every other door closed on us. Each release of funds was smooth and painless. Thanks Kelly Tyson who dealt with us all the way through

reviews.title: Friendly, personal service and great product
reviews.text: Delighted to find this provider dedicated to and rewarding eco-conscious self-build projects such as ours, who don't demand design compromises as other providers did. We had a single point of contact throughout the application process who was friendly, personable and answered all our questions very promptly. The mortgage drawdown flexibility suits our schedule and the C-change discount is a great bonus.

reviews.title: Fantastic ethical building society
reviews.text: This bank was and is the most helpful company I have ever used! I’ve never said that about a finance company EVER! They were understanding , cared about the concept of our build. It was a strawbale eco house on tyre foundations making it carbon negative. The customer services has always been great and still is. If a company deserves this award then the ecology building society deserve to win this.

reviews.title: Trustworthy and on my side
reviews.text: I tried another lender for my own- build project but found them uncaring and they started to pile on ‘hidden’ fees. I was so relieved to find Ecology who have been dependable, straightforward and who have felt as though they are on my side throughout the project + I found them very reasonable as far as rates go. House now completed!

reviews.title: Ethical lending encouraging sustainability
reviews.text: Ecology provided us with a mortgage for our house in 1998. Since then we’ve remortgaged to install solar panels, a hydro scheme and extra insulation and benefited from a reduced interest rate. A force for good in the world!

reviews.title: Help full and friendly
reviews.text: Ecology help me with my self biuld project, without hassle , they were there the whole way if or when I needed them , even in these tough times they were easy too contact. I would definitely recommend ecology.

reviews.title: Best mortgage provider we have experienced in 50 years
reviews.text: Ecology BS matches our values about houses for the future. All should be Net Zero, all should provide healthy, happy, green and affordable housing. Ecology offers you the same personal adviser for all your transactions, so you always feel that you are valued and understood. Why can’t they all be like Ecology BS.

reviews.title: Friendly and Professional
reviews.text: Throughout our mortgage application The Ecology Building Society were amazing. They treated us as individual human beings and talked through all aspects of our application over the phone in a very friendly manner. It is because of their fantastic mortgages that we have been able to build our dream off grid home in our woodlands.

reviews.title: Restoration Life Saver and Family Spirit!
reviews.text: I found Ecology when searching the internet into the night for one last chance to save a father and son restoration project. From start to finish the team have been super friendly, you really feel confident and part of their way of life. I value their forward thinking, values and modern take on the world of mortgages, which can feel a bit old money. My solicitor commented many times during the process at how easy and friendly Ecology are to deal with. Everything feels right, professional, approachable and always looking forward. Looking forward to this continuing.

reviews.title: Self build mortgage

The process whilst thorough was easy and they were helpful in what they could offer. We ended up with a mortgage that suits are needs and is affordable. I was really impressed with the process and would recommend them as a lender.

reviews.title: Excellent customer service
reviews.text: Both pre-pandemic and during, Ecology's customer service has been excellent. They are understanding, efficient and helpful. The mortgage application was straightforward, and the fees were very competitive for a self build mortgage.

reviews.title: Human, personal society; with ethical ethos
reviews.text: A lender that supports atypical self builds; showed flexibility during the build and during the repayment phases; you can email or phone a named individual and get a personal response.

reviews.title: 20 years a customer
reviews.text: I've been with the Ecology for over 20 years, and always glad to be a customer. One of the very few financial institutions that has a genuinely ethical and responsible approach. No gimmicks or special offers, just simple savings products with decent interest rates. In the past, the online banking was cumbersome, but it's now fine. So good to know your money is supporting other people who need loans to buy, build and renovate properties, rather than going to pay banker bonuses. Also a small company based here in Yorkshire, so what is not to like.

reviews.title: Ecology Online Banking
reviews.text: Only gave 4 stars because of the Online Banking, which is not the most up-to-date system. (There is not yet an app, but I believe this is in development). Savings: Good value for money, ISAs have good savings rate in line with other providers.

reviews.title: ethical, and excellent customer service

reviews.title: Ethical Consumer gives the EBS an ethiscore of 100%.
reviews.text: Ethical Consumer gives the EBS an ethiscore of 100%. Where we put our money is one of the most powerful ways we have of changing the world, so that's really important.

reviews.title: A small building society with big ambitions
reviews.text: I joined in 2022 and have been impressed with both their value for money and their approach to making the world a better place ever since. Even the AGM was fun!

reviews.title: Easy to deal with and an ethical provider.

I particularly liked the salary ration structure (so CEO and senior staff are not way above those who do so much of the work) albeit this has been diluted more recently.

I would definitely recommend them to anyone, especially those who want to have a positive social impact.

reviews.title: Really please to use Ecology for my monthly savings...

Sure, the interest rate offered is modest - but this is outweighed by the peace of mind Ecology Building Society offers its customers.

I was delighted to find Ecology Bank and to see that they share my values and are open and transparent without “ greenwashing”. While my money is tied up for 180 days the 5% interest rate is extremely competitive. I am aware that this rate may go down following the BoE reduction but I will happily stay invested with this bank in the knowledge that not only am I getting a good rate but, more importantly, my money is being used to support businesses which reflect my values.

reviews.title: The most ethical savings account on the market, with a good interest rate too!
reviews.text: I've been banking with Ecology for about eight years now. I was drawn to them by a Move Your Money campaign that looked at how ethical the UK's banks and building societies are, and rated Ecology at the top of the pile. Ecology invests savings into mortgages for people building new eco-friendly homes, or making green modifications to existing ones. This helps to reduce the carbon footprint of the UK's notoriously draughty housing stock; reduce energy bills for homeowners and builders; and give people the chance to build their dream home. What's not to like! Their online web portal is easy to use, their team are friendly and easy to contact, and their savings rates are very competitive, much to my surprise as I'd previously thought that "green" = "premium price/lower interest rates," but clearly that is not the case. I'd recommend Ecology to everyone, for savings and for mortgages.

reviews.text: I've invested with Ecology for years now, since they were (one of) the first genuinely ethical savings provider out there. Their products are easy to understand and use, their customer service is excellent and it's great to know my savings are safe while doing good work!

reviews.title: Ethical Savings
reviews.text: Good to have an ethical savings account. Also at a higher savings rate than most (less ethical) savings accounts. Great to take part in an ethical organisation

reviews.title: I know my savings are being used ethically
reviews.text: I know my savings are being used ethically and giving me a good return. The company is always easy to talk to and transactions happen smoothly

reviews.title: Efficient Ethical Building Society
reviews.text: Ecology Building Society keeps me up to date abut their savings' products. I appreciate their snapshots of what properties they have loaned money for. I can always telephone their office and speak to a real person.

reviews.title: Amazing ethics and customer service all rolled in to one.
reviews.text: The Ecology Building Society is a safe and smart place to save your money. Not only do you know that your money is being invested in ethical ways but also that you are getting a competitive rate of return.

reviews.title: Great to know money is supporting worthwhile projects.
reviews.text: Using the 90-day notice account for funds from early inheritence, to be used for our children in the future. Reassuring to know that community projects can benefit from our savings. Ecology have kept me informed clearly of any developments over the past 12 months.

reviews.title: Ethical, professional, reliable
reviews.text: Ethics excellent, communication excellent, and tailored to what we need, eg my daughter can’t spend time on a screen so gets all her communications by post.

reviews.title: Good savings rates with excellent ethics
reviews.text: After spending quite a bit of time reviewing available ethical savings accounts, the Ecology Building Society regular saver account came out with one of the best rates whilst meeting all the ethical criteria i was concerned about. It also seemed a good longer term option as it wasn't just an introductory rate that would drop to near-zero after 12 months like certain competitor's offerings!

reviews.title: Supports my principles
reviews.text: Great ethical organisation with which to save. Knowing my money is invested in projects, such as housing, that make a difference and are important to me.

reviews.title: Great service from an Ethical provider
reviews.text: Ecology is a great small building society. I like the fact that my money is lent out on environmentally friendly projects.

reviews.title: The greater green good!
reviews.text: A wonderful organisation that thinks locally and acts globally. We are in climate emergency. Ecology Building Society do whatever it takes to do the right thing with their ethical savings products.

reviews.title: Environmentally and economically very, very good
reviews.text: Very sound with advice, performance and customer services

reviews.title: great ethics great products great customer service :)
reviews.text: great ethics great products great customer service :)

reviews.title: Excellent ethical company
reviews.text: We have invested with the Ecology Building Society for decades particularly because of their ethical and sustainable work. We need more banking companies with this ethos.

reviews.title: They are the most ethical financial provider, end of
reviews.text: Pretty much all the big banks (like Barclays, HSBC and others) are up their necks in investing in harm , ecocide and human rights abuses - with Ecology Building Society you can look yourself in the mirror knowing that your money isn't harming your kids' future, or anyone else's

reviews.title: Honours its pledges
reviews.text: It is pleasing to see that the Ecology Building Society honours its pledges in that, at a time of ultra-low interest rates, it guarantees a minimum interest rate of 1% per annum to its loyal members.

reviews.title: The original 'green' building society
reviews.text: I've been saving with the Ecology Building Society for almost 40 years and have always appreciated the friendly, personal help from staff (no endless automatic labyrinth.) and peace of mind in knowing that my money is being invested in positive projects that don't contradict my principles.

reviews.title: Banking with a conscience
reviews.text: I have complete peace of mind knowing that my money is being used for good purposes and invested in things that doesn't destroy our planet. The small scale, friendliness and approachability of the staff is also wonderful. Thank you :)

reviews.title: Outstanding aims, ideals and vision. Excellent customer service.
reviews.text: So pleased to have found a truly ethical financial organisation with the values and vision that I can wholeheartedly support and feel I can trust with my savings.

reviews.title: Spot on
reviews.text: Good ethical service, staff always really helpful too.

reviews.title: Ethical, ecological and fair
reviews.text: Ecology building society is helping fund sustainable building and renovations and I pleased that my savings help this happen. I feel my money is safe with them because of their cautious approach. I think there interest rates are fair and they do not treat existing savers less well by lowering old account rates and offering high rates just to new customers. I am informed about changes to accounts or rates and there is an interesting newsletter. The staff are helpful. The society has a fair pay policy and lower CEO salaries than other building societies. I have been to AGMs where they are open with members and answer questions. The society and provide interesting information about more sustainable living and ethical banking. I do recommend the Ecology building society to family and friends.

reviews.title: Why go elsewhere?
reviews.text: Ecology Building Society is the best UK ethical financial provider, and from experiences elsewhere is the best Building Society. They provided the best savings account when I looked for a new one. Customer service has been brilliant and I feel I've been treated fairly as a customer. So we will be applying for a specialist mortgage with Ecology as they are an excellent provider.

reviews.title: Keeps up the professional end - and ethics too!!
reviews.text: I've been with EBS since 2007 and it is part of my personal/psychological furniture of being part of something positive that pioneers positive ethical/environmental/social change!! I'm proud to be part of the Ecological Building Society !!

reviews.title: Environmentally Beneficial Saving
reviews.text: I've had several different accounts as a saver with EBS over a 20 year period during which I've been extremely satisfied with all the service. I have on occasion shopped around to see if my money would be better invested elsewhere and each time I have decided EBS is still the best provider for my needs. This is partly due to giving favourable interest rates compared with other lenders but also due to EBS playing an important role in bringing about environmentally beneficial changes in housing construction and renovation. It's important to me as an investor to know that my investments are being used to build homes that are sustainable, require less energy to heat and minimize the use of toxic substances. EBS keeps its members regularly informed about projects the society is investing in. There isn't any other bank or building society, that I'm aware of, that provides this ''ecological saving service''.

reviews.title: Ethical Building Society with great customer service.
reviews.text: The Ecology BS support sustainable home building and put environmental issues at the heart of their business.

reviews.title: Ethical. Leading by example
reviews.text: This building society is approachable. I have attended the AGM's in person a number of times. A good rate of interest offered and rarely changes. I know my money is being used ethically for practical ecologically projects.

reviews.title: Great ethical savings and local community
reviews.text: Great to know savings and investments are used for good causes for the local community and with a great ethical ethos.

reviews.title: Explanation of and information on green and sustainable building using natural materials
reviews.text: I read the Ecology Building Society Review as it is full of useful up to date information. When contacting the Ecology Building Society they are very helpful and well informed. We are lucky to have a Building Society with an emphasis on Ecology.

reviews.title: Mr F J Knock
reviews.text: Always received free and friendly information on savings options

reviews.title: Highly Commended
reviews.text: My Earthwise Cash ISA has quite a good interest rate . Also when I ring up with an enquiry I am always treated with the utmost respect and patience for which I am really grateful. My favourite Building Society I do not need the mortgage services but admire the fact that they only lend for environmentally sound builds and that the headquarters live up to their standards also I have really enjoyed the AGMs

reviews.title: great customer service and great neighbours!
reviews.text: the staff were very helpful to me when i was setting up a savings account. The head office is based in my home town and the building and grounds are a real community asset.

reviews.title: Supporting sustainable building through ethical investment
reviews.text: Very friendly efficient service. Ecology enables me to make an ethical banking choice and for my money to support mortgages for sustainable building too.

reviews.title: Best support and communication ever
reviews.text: I've been with Ecology Building Society for quite a few years and I never had a moment when I felt uninformed or confused about my savings. I feel the company values me and my investments. The company is very ethical and I feel reassured by the way my money is invested. Thank you!

reviews.title: Great services and great customer experience
reviews.text: I've been with Ecology for quite a few years and I always come away from any dealings with them feeling positive - which is more than I can say for other financial institutions. I've always had the impression that they really care about their customers, and the quality and efficiency of their service, as well as prioritising people and planet with the way they operate. I feel like I can relax knowing that they're doing their best for me, even in these challenging times.

reviews.title: Ethical and efficient
reviews.text: I have been saving with the EBS since 2003. For all of that time I have had their Eco-60 savings account and in the past I have also invested in their Earthsaver Bond. Over the years I have paid in and withdrawn from my account and all transactions have been done efficiently. I have also attended some AGMs which are informative and enjoyable.

reviews.title: Well used resources
reviews.text: I am very pleased that the money that I have with the Ecology Building Society is used for ethical purposes.
